DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic Procedure Cerebrospinal Fluid Cytology Positive Finding Assessment Yes No Not Done Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indication as to whether or not the patient has a positive cerebrospinal fluid cytology test result.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diagnostic Procedure Cerebrospinal Fluid Cytology Positive Finding Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a diagnostic procedure (methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability) and a positive finding (an observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease or condition) in an assessment of cerebrospinal fluid (the fluid flowing around the brain and spinal cord) cytology (the branch of biology that studies the structure and function of cells).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder.

Property.preferredName: Cerebrospinal Fluid Cytology Positive Finding Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: (seh-REE-broe-SPY-nal) The fluid flowing around the brain and spinal cord. Cerebrospinal fluid is produced in the ventricles in the brain.:Cytology; the branch of biology that studies the structure and function of cells.:An observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The fluid that is contained within the brain ventricles, the subarachnoid space and the central canal of the spinal cord.
The light microscopic study of normal and abnormal cells in fine needle aspirates (FNAs), body cavity fluids, and smears.
A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify an affirmative response, negative response, or indication that an event did not occur.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Affirmative response to a question or activity.:No value exists.:No Value Exists:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
